name: Presentation/Slide Deck template
description:
Moving to Figma


Today, our team at Neo Financial starts a 21-day trial for Figma Organization. Some of the designers are unsure, so I made this slide deck to help set expectations for the trial.


The Slide Deck

I created it to set expectations on the trial, and what I think we're going to achieve. Showing this on standup after a few weeks of talking about Figma set the tone for the trial and got buy in from the rest of the team.


Feel free to use it for the same purpose, or remix it and show me what you make!
